summary: This document is a financial statement from Deutsche Bank detailing the account activity of Jeffrey Epstein for the month of August 2015. It includes information on deposits, withdrawals, checks paid, and the ending balance of the account, highlighting significant transactions and fees associated with the account.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein

keyFacts: The account balance at the beginning of August 2015 was $327,216.10.
The ending balance as of August 31, 2015, was $140,677.52.
Multiple checks were issued during August, including significant payments to Gulfstream Aerospace Corporation.
There were no overdraft fees or NSF return item fees for the statement period.
The document includes instructions for reporting errors or inquiries related to the account.
